snippet.title: Kaamos | Release Date Announcement Trailer | indie.io
snippet.description:
The darkness never fades—watch the Kaamos release date reveal and prepare for a battle of wits and survival! Available April 28, 2025, on Steam!

 Wishlist Now ➤ https://bit.ly/Kaamos_Steam

Kaamos is a bite-sized turn-based puzzle roguelike where every move matters. Master a unique looping tile-based combat system, build your character with powerful gear, and uncover the mystery behind a world where the Sun never rises. Outsmart your foes, adapt your tactics, and embrace the darkness.

⚔️ Engage in strategic, tile-based battles
🔄 Manipulate looping grid mechanics to counter enemy attacks
🛡️ Customize your build with over 180 weapons, armor, and rings
🌑 Explore a dark medieval world filled with secrets and danger

Visit indie.io on Steam ➤ https://bit.ly/indieiofranchise

#Kaamos #Roguelike #PuzzleGame #IndieGame #TurnBased #Steam
